# Siberius - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Siberius is a complete PDF indexing and service order management system with:
- **Backend**: Node.js + TypeScript + Express + Prisma + PostgreSQL
- **Frontend**: React + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS

## Backend Structure
- API REST with 30+ endpoints
- Hybrid authentication (email/password + PIN for touch screens)
- JWT tokens with 12h expiration
- Recursive PDF scanning and version control
- Team management with conflict detection

## Frontend Requirements
- Modern React 18+ with TypeScript
- Vite for fast development
- React Router for navigation
- Axios for API calls
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- JWT token management
- Protected routes
- Responsive design (desktop + touch screens)

## Key Features
- Login with email/password or PIN
- Dashboard with statistics
- Orders (Ordens de Serviço) management
- Technicians (Técnicos) management
- Attendance (Atendimentos) and team scheduling
- Users (Usuários) management
- Real-time conflict detection

## API Base URL
Development: http://localhost:3000
